FuncDef:
The lsp-version command can configure the protocol that is used by the LSP test instance.
The undo lsp-version command can restore the default setting.
By default, RFC 4379 is adopted.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the PTN mode is used for the LSP.
The PTN mode is recommended when the device is required to communicate with the PTN 3900.

Indicates that the protocol defined in RFC 4379 is adopted.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The lsp-version command can be used to specify the protocol that is used by the LSP test instance.
Prerequisites
Before setting lsp-version, you must set test-type to pwe3trace.
The protocol adopted by a running LSP test instance cannot be changed.
